mobs.long_desc: A gardener is busy trimming the bushes.
mobs.desc: The gardener is a middle-aged man, dressed in a one-piece, brown coveralls. With a quick hand and precise cuts, he expertly trims the hedge he is working on into the likeness of an animal. Too engrossed in his work, he doesn't notice you admiring his handiwork.

mobs.long_desc: A large, black hedge trimmed to resemble a raven is planted here.
mobs.desc: As black as night, the leaves of this fine specimen does resemble feathers, making this hedge look exactly like a huge raven. You wonder where this plant came from, as you've never seen black leaves before. The hedge seems to be swaying a bit. Must be the wind, or is it?

mobs.long_desc: A white hedge trimmed like a unicorn stands proudly before you.
mobs.desc: Fine, silvery white leaves makes you suspect this magnificent plant was acquired from elven hands. You peer at the plant, amazed at its sparkling colours, from its shimmering white foliage, to its bright gold branches. The hedge seems to be swaying a bit. Must be the wind, or is it?

mobs.long_desc: A majestic hedge in the form of a lion is before you.
mobs.desc: Bright, golden leaves convinces you this plant is an acquisition from far off lands, as you've never seen its like before. The light dancing off its leaves gives it an aura of majesty, befitting the form the gardener has given it. The hedge seems to be swaying a bit. Must be the wind, or is it?

mobs.long_desc: A fearsome, fiery red dragon hedge dominates the path.
mobs.desc: The bright red and yellow leaves somehow projects a feeling of rage, hate and fear in you. You marvel at the skill of the gardeners, to be able to capture the essense of this beast whose form the hedge represents. The hedge seems to be swaying a bit. Must be the wind, or is it?

mobs.long_desc: A playful looking dolphin hedge stands at the side of the path.
mobs.desc: The gentle form of this wonderful creature of the sea is accurately captured by the hand of man. It almost seems to be alive, joyfully dancing to the song of the sea, and laughing at the antics of man. The hedge seems to be swaying a bit. Must be the wind, or is it?

mobs.long_desc: A robed wizard walks around, watering the roots in the room.
mobs.desc: A harmless, middle-aged man walks about the room, a water-can in his hand. Occassionally, he stops to water the roots which grow in his abode. He wears a shimmering green robe, which in spite of all the dirt here, doesn't seem to be soiled.

mobs.long_desc: There is a vine lying on the ground.
mobs.desc: A rather large vine is lying here. You can't see where it starts but it does seem to be coming closer and closer towards you.

objects.ground: A large pair of gardening scissors lies among the bushes.

extras.text: The scissors is rather large and sharp, highly suitable to trim hedges.  In the hands of a skilled user, it could really cut life down to size.

objects.ground: A red rose is growing here.

extras.text: The rose's scent fills your nostrils.  You get a feeling of euphoria just by touching the flower.

objects.ground: A large shovel is stuck in the ground.

extras.text: The shovel is large and unwieldy.  It would probably be difficult to use this properly if you aren't strong enough.

objects.ground: A wild orchid grows among the bushes.

extras.text: The scent of the orchid somehow gives you a clearer head.  You feel you can take on the world now.

objects.ground: A green robe lies in a crumpled heap here.

extras.text: The robe is made of a fine satin-like material.  You get a strange tingling feeling as you run your finger along its seams.

objects.ground: Someone left a white rose here.

extras.text: A pure white flower tips the stalk, its fragrance subtle and sweet.  It brings to mind thoughts of romance, and lovely ladies.  Its softness reminds you of its fragility, and the need for it to be protected.

rooms.name: Cobblestone Path
rooms.description: You are on a well tended cobblestone path leading north towards a large metal gate.  There is a strong smell of flowers here.  At the side of the path are low hedges, just up to your knees in height.

rooms.name: Cobblestone Path
rooms.description: You are on a well tended cobblestone path leading north towards a large metal gate.  There is a strong smell of flowers here.  At the side of the path are low hedges, just up to your knees in height.

rooms.name: Metal Gate
rooms.description: You stand before a large and magnificently decorated iron gate.  It is the only entrance into the topiary.  A dense hedge around 8 feet high surrounds the place.  A large sign on top of the gate proclaims: Welcome To Mielikki's Topiary

North.description: The gate is made of a very shiny material which seems to be resistant to damage and rust.

rooms.name: Western Path
rooms.description: The path at the western end of the topiary goes on to the north.  You see that it is parallel to the main path.  The hedges form paths that are perpendicular to this path.  The way to the west is blocked by tall hedges.

rooms.name: Cool Path
rooms.description: You are on an east-west path running perpendicularly to the main cobblestone path.  Tall hedges line the path and flowers are blooming everywhere.  Their heavy scent gives the impression of peace but you are unable to shake off that there is something sinister here.

rooms.name: Topiary Entrance
rooms.description: You are inside the topiary.  Hedges line the way to the east and west.  A cobblestone path leads to the north.  Far to the north, you can see a gazebo. The gateway leading out is to the south.

South.description: This end of the gate somehow seems different. There are small spots splattered on the surface. You wonder why you never noticed that from the outside.

rooms.name: Cool Path
rooms.description: You are on an east-west path running perpendicularly to the main cobblestone path.  Tall hedges line the path and flowers are blooming everywhere.  Their heavy scent gives the impression of peace but you are unable to shake off that there is something sinister here.

rooms.name: Eastern Path
rooms.description: The path at the eastern end of the topiary goes on to the north.  You see that it is parallel to the main path.  The hedges form paths that are perpendicular to this path.  The way to the east is blocked by tall hedges.

rooms.name: Western Path
rooms.description: The path at the western end of the topiary goes on to the north.  You see that it is parallel to the main path.  The hedges form paths that are perpendicular to this path.  The way to the west is blocked by tall hedges.

rooms.name: Cool Path
rooms.description: You are on an east-west path running perpendicularly to the main cobblestone path.  Tall hedges line the path and flowers are blooming everywhere.  Their heavy scent gives the impression of peace but you are unable to shake off that there is something sinister here.

rooms.name: Cobblestone Path
rooms.description: The cobblestone path leads towards the north.  Hedges to the west and east form shaded paths.  Here and there you see large hedges trimmed to resemble animals.  Far to the north, you see a small, white gazebo.

rooms.name: Cool Path
rooms.description: You are on an east-west path running perpendicularly to the main cobblestone path.  Tall hedges line the path and flowers are blooming everywhere.  Their heavy scent gives the impression of peace but you are unable to shake off the feeling that there is something sinister here.

rooms.name: Eastern Path
rooms.description: The path at the eastern end of the topiary goes on to the north.  You see that it is parallel to the main path.  The hedges form paths that are perpendicular to this path.  The way to the east is blocked by tall hedges.

rooms.name: Western Path
rooms.description: The path at the western end of the topiary goes on to the north.  You see that it is parallel to the main path.  The hedges form paths that are perpendicular to this path.  The way to the west is blocked by tall hedges.

rooms.name: Cool Path
rooms.description: You are on an east-west path running perpendicularly to the main cobblestone path.  Tall hedges line the path and flowers are blooming everywhere.  Their heavy scent gives the impression of peace but you are unable to shake off that there is something sinister here.

rooms.name: Cobblestone Path
rooms.description: The cobblestone path leads towards the north.  Hedges to the west and east form shaded paths.  Here and there you see large hedges trimmed to resemble animals.  Far to the north, you see a small, white gazebo.

rooms.name: Cool Path
rooms.description: You are on an east-west path running perpendicularly to the main cobblestone path.  Tall hedges line the path and flowers are blooming everywhere.  Their heavy scent gives the impression of peace but you are unable to shake off that there is something sinister here.

rooms.name: Eastern Path
rooms.description: The path at the eastern end of the topiary goes on to the north.  You see that it is parallel to the main path.  The hedges form paths that are perpendicular to this path.  The way to the east is blocked by tall hedges.

rooms.name: End Of Western Path
rooms.description: You have come to the northern end of the western path.  A tall hedge blocks your passage to the north.  The only way out is towards the east and back to the south.  Through the hedges, you can see another path extending further towards the north.

rooms.name: Cool Path
rooms.description: You are on an east-west path running perpendicularly to the main cobblestone path.  Tall hedges line the path and flowers are blooming everywhere.  Their heavy scent gives the impression of peace but you are unable to shake off that there is something sinister here.

rooms.name: Near The Gazebo
rooms.description: There is a gazebo forming the partition between the north and south part of this topiary.  You have to go through it to get to the other side.  You wonder what could have prompted such a strange design.  Perhaps the landscaper had a little too much to drink that day.

extras.text: The gazebo is a rather large, white open structure. There are whitewashed benches in it. Planted around the gazebo are sweet smelling flowering plants.

rooms.name: Cool Path
rooms.description: You are on an east-west path running perpendicularly to the main cobblestone path.  Tall hedges line the path and flowers are blooming everywhere.  Their heavy scent gives the impression of peace but you are unable to shake off that there is something sinister here.

rooms.name: End Of Eastern Path
rooms.description: You have come to the northern end of the eastern path.  A tall hedge blocks your passage to the north.  The only way out is towards the west and back to the south.  Through the hedges, you can see another path extending further towards the north.

rooms.name: The Gazebo
rooms.description: A cool breeze always seems to be passing through this gazebo.  Its large roof provides shelter from even the worst weather.  This is a perfect place to relax and smell the flowers.  There are entrances to the topiary to the north and south.  However, it seems like no one has been here for some time.  There is a fine film of dust on the benches, and the floorboards creak beneath your feet.

Down.description: A board here comes loose, revealing a small trapdoor.

rooms.name: End Of Western Path
rooms.description: You have come to the southern end of the western path.  A tall hedge blocks your passage to the south.  The only way out is towards the east and back to the north.  Through the hedges, you can see another path extending further towards the south.

rooms.name: Cool Path
rooms.description: You are on an east-west path running perpendicularly to the main cobblestone path.  Tall hedges line the path and flowers are blooming everywhere.  Their heavy scent gives the impression of peace but you are unable to shake off that there is something sinister here.

rooms.name: Near The Gazebo
rooms.description: A large wooden gazebo stands right in the center of a wide garden path. One must go into the gazebo to get from the southern part of it to the northern part of it. The structure is whitewashed, with a dome-shaped roof overhead and a pretty view of the surrounding topiary.

extras.text: The gazebo is a rather large, white open structure. There are whitewashed benches in it. Planted around the gazebo are sweet smelling flowering plants.

rooms.name: Cool Path
rooms.description: You are on an east-west path running perpendicularly to the main cobblestone path.  Tall hedges line the path and flowers are blooming everywhere.  Their heavy scent gives the impression of peace but you are unable to shake off that there is something sinister here.

rooms.name: End Of Eastern Path
rooms.description: You have come to the southern end of the eastern path.  A tall hedge blocks your passage to the south.  The only way out is towards the west and back to the north.  Through the hedges, you can see another path extending further towards the south.

rooms.name: Western Path
rooms.description: The path at the western end of the topiary goes onwards towards the south. You see that it is parallel to the main path.  The hedges form paths that are perpendicular to this path.  The way to the west is blocked by tall hedges.

rooms.name: Cool Path
rooms.description: You are on an east-west path running perpendicularly to the main cobblestone path.  Tall hedges line the path and flowers are blooming everywhere.  Their heavy scent gives the impression of peace but you are unable to shake off that there is something sinister here.

rooms.name: Cobblestone Path
rooms.description: The cobblestone path leads towards the south.  Hedges to the west and east form shaded paths.  Here and there you see large hedges trimmed to resemble animals.  Far to the south, you see a small, white gazebo.

rooms.name: Cool Path
rooms.description: You are on an east-west path running perpendicularly to the main cobblestone path.  Tall hedges line the path and flowers are blooming everywhere.  Their heavy scent gives the impression of peace but you are unable to shake off that there is something sinister here.

rooms.description: The path at the eastern end of the topiary goes onwards towards the south. You see that it is parallel to the main path.  The hedges form paths that are perpendicular to this path.  The way to the east is blocked by tall hedges.

rooms.name: Western Path
rooms.description: The path at the western end of the topiary goes onwards towards the south. You see that it is parallel to the main path.  The hedges form paths that are perpendicular to this path.  The way to the west appears to be blocked by tall hedges.  However, you notice a slight parting between a few of the branches within the hedges.

rooms.description: You are on an east-west path running perpendicularly to the main cobblestone path.  Tall hedges line the path and flowers are blooming everywhere.  Their heavy scent gives the impression of peace but you are unable to shake off that there is something sinister here.

rooms.name: Eastern Path
rooms.description: The path at the eastern end of the topiary goes on to the south.  You see that it is parallel to the main path.  The hedges form paths that are perpendicular to this path.  The way to the east is blocked by tall hedges.

rooms.name: Dark Tunnel
rooms.description: You find yourself in a dark, tunnel with strange, cobweb like material hanging from the walls.  A strange smell permeates the air.  You are reminded of cut grass and freshly dug earth.

Up.description: You see that there is some sort of green substance stuck to the bottom of the trapdoor. You recoil from the pungent stench emitted by it.

rooms.name: Dark Tunnel
rooms.description: You find yourself in a dark, tunnel with strange, cobweb like material hanging from the walls.  A strange smell permeates the air.  You are reminded of cut grass and freshly dug earth.

rooms.name: Hedge Wizard's Chamber
rooms.description: You find yourself in a very cozy circular room.  The walls of the room are trees with roots growing out of them.  A green, mushy material covers the ground, like a grass carpet.
